mapper.select: select d.dc_no dcNo, p.prod_no prodNo, d.dcname dcName, d.dcrate dcName, d.dctype dcType from discount d, product p where p.prod_no = d.prod_no and p.prod_no = #{prodNo}

select dc_no dcNo, dcname dcName, to_char(begindc, 'yyyy-mm-dd') beginDc, to_char(enddc, 'yyyy-mm-dd') endDc, dcrate dcRate, dctype dcType from discount where prod_no = #{prodNo} and (beginDc is null or ( to_date(#{viewDate}) >= beginDc and to_date(#{viewDate}) <= endDc)) order by begindc desc ,dctype, dcrate

select prodname, hallname, dcname, d.dc_no dcNo, d.prod_no prodNo, begindc, enddc, dcrate, dctype from product p, hall h, discount d where p.hall_no= h.hall_no and p.prod_no= d.prod_no and d.prod_no= #{prodNo}
select distinct prodname, hallname from product p, hall h, discount d where p.hall_no= h.hall_no and p.prod_no= d.prod_no and d.prod_no= #{prodNo}
